# Teaching experience

## Courses

##### BIO2041 Biostatistique 1
Course instructor: Dr. Alexandre Collin\
*Université de Montréal*\
[{{< fa road >}} course syllabus (fall 2022)](https://bio.umontreal.ca/public/FAS/biologie/Documents/1-Programmes-cours/Cours_et_horaires/AUTOMNE_2022/BIO2041.pdf), [{{< fa building-columns >}} admission](https://admission.umontreal.ca/cours-et-horaires/cours/bio-2041/)

<details style="font-size:17px">
<summary>course description</summary>
Biological statistics. Parameters of a distribution. Probability distributions. Confidence intervals. Decision theory. Comparison of two samples. Correlation. Analysis of variance. Chi-square tests. Regression
</details>

**Head teaching assistant:** {{< fa ghost >}} fall 2022\
**Teaching assistant:** <i class="fa-solid fa-sun" style="color: #dec317;"></i>
summers 2022-23\
**Tutor:** <i class="fa-solid fa-sun" style="color: #dec317;"></i> summers 2020-23\

##### BIO2042 Biostatistique 2
Course instructor: Dr. Alexandre Collin\
*Université de Montréal*\
[{{< fa road >}} course syllabus (winter 2023)](https://bio.umontreal.ca/public/FAS/biologie/Documents/1-Programmes-cours/Cours_et_horaires/HIVER_2023/BIO2042.pdf), [{{< fa building-columns >}} admission](https://admission.umontreal.ca/cours-et-horaires/cours/bio-2042/)

<details style="font-size:17px">

</details>

##### BIO2811 Dynamique des populations
Course instructor: Pr. Daniel Boisclair\
*Université de Montréal*\
[{{< fa road >}} course syllabus (winter 2022)](https://bio.umontreal.ca/public/FAS/biologie/Documents/1-Programmes-cours/Cours_et_horaires/HIVER_2022/cycles_sup%C3%A9rieurs/BIO2811_6034.pdf), [{{< fa building-columns >}} admission](https://admission.umontreal.ca/cours-et-horaires/cours/bio-2811/)

<details style="font-size:17px">
<summary>course description</summary>
Processes responsible for temporal variations in the abundance of animal and plant populations. Description and use of mathematical models to quantify and predict variations in population abundance.
</details>

**Grader:** <i class="fa-solid fa-snowflake" style="color: #194ca4;"></i>
winters 2021-22

##### BIO3043 Théorie des réseaux
Course instructor: Pr. Timothée Poisot\
*Université de Montréal*\
[{{< fa road >}} course syllabus (fall 2020)](https://bio.umontreal.ca/public/FAS/biologie/Documents/1-Programmes-cours/Cours_et_horaires/AUTOMNE_2020/cycles_sup%C3%A9rieurs/BIO3043-6037_PCA20_TPoisot.pdf), [{{< fa building-columns >}} admission](https://admission.umontreal.ca/cours-et-horaires/cours/bio-3043/)

<details style="font-size:17px">
<summary>course description</summary>
Description of ecological communities from the perspective of network theory, structure of interactions between species, prediction of emergent properties of ecosystems, spatial and evolutionary dynamics of community structure. 
</details>
